verses.verse: Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> fear, <S%G5399><s%> lest, <S%G3379><s%> a promise <S%G1860><s%> being left <S%G2641><s%> us of entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest, <S%G2663><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> should seem <S%G1380><s%> to come short <S%G5302><s%> of it.

For <S%G1063><s%> unto us <S%G2532><s%> was the gospel preached, <S%G2070><s%> <S%G2097><s%> as well as <S%G2509><s%> unto them: <S%G2548><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> preached <S%G189><s%> did not <S%G3756><s%> profit <S%G5623><s%> them, <S%G1565><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> being mixed with <S%G4786><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in them that heard <S%G191><s%> it.

For <S%G1063><s%> we which have believed <S%G4100><s%> do enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> rest, <S%G2663><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he said, <S%G2046><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> I have sworn <S%G3660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath, <S%G3709><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> they shall enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest: <S%G2663><s%> although <S%G2543><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> were finished <S%G1096><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he spake <S%G2046><s%> in a certain place <S%G4225><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> day on this wise, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did rest <S%G2664><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G848><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> place again, <S%G3825><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> they shall enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest. <S%G2663><s%>

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it remaineth <S%G620><s%> that some <S%G5100><s%> must enter <S%G1525><s%> therein, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they to whom it was first preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G4386><s%> entered not in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G3756><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of unbelief: <S%G543><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> he limiteth <S%G3724><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> David, <S%G1138><s%> Today, <S%G4594><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> so long <S%G5118><s%> a time; <S%G5550><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is said, <S%G2046><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Joshua <S%G2424><s%> had given them rest, <S%G2664><s%> <S%G846><s%> then would he not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G302><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> another <S%G243><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>
There remaineth <S%G620><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> a rest <S%G4520><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he that is entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest, <S%G2663><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath ceased <S%G2664><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did from <S%G575><s%> his. <S%G2398><s%>

Let us labor <S%G4704><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> rest, <S%G2663><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> after <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> example <S%G5262><s%> of unbelief. <S%G543><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is quick, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powerful, <S%G1756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sharper <S%G5114><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword, <S%G3162><s%> piercing <S%G1338><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G891><s%> the dividing asunder <S%G3311><s%> of <S%G5037><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of the joints <S%G719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marrow, <S%G3452><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is a discerner <S%G2924><s%> of the thoughts <S%G1761><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intents <S%G1771><s%> of the heart. <S%G2588><s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> there any creature <S%G2937><s%> that is not manifest <S%G852><s%> in his sight: <S%G1799><s%> <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are naked <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> opened <S%G5136><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have to do. <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3056><s%>

Seeing then <S%G3767><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%> that is passed into <S%G1330><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> let us hold fast <S%G2902><s%> our profession. <S%G3671><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> which cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3361><s%> be touched with the feeling of <S%G4834><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities; <S%G769><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> was in <S%G2596><s%> all points <S%G3956><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> like as <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3665><s%> we are, yet without <S%G5565><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G4334><s%> boldly <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3954><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%> of grace, <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may obtain <S%G2983><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to help in time of need. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2121><s%> <S%G996><s%>
